findings.title: Pools.sol - User can spam updatePool function to add accTokenPerShare unlimited
findings.description: The updatePool function can be spammed by users to add an unlimited amount of accTokenPerShare, causing the paid rewardTokens to be a very large number due to the accumulation factor being too high.

findings.title: Staking.sol Unsafe using `transfer` method in `withdraw` function
findings.description: Using `transfer` method in `withdraw` function can cause issues when transferring tokens, and it is recommended to use SafeERC20 library for IERC20 and change all transfer methods to safeTransfer.

findings.title: Farms.sol - Redundant code in safeTokenTransferReward function
findings.description: There is a redundant statement in the safeTokenTransferReward function that transfers rewardToken from this contract to itself, which can be removed for gas saving.
